original_text:
Tyre has built herself a rampart
    and heaped up silver like dust,
    and fine gold like the mud of the streets.
korean_text: 두로는 자기를 위하여 요새를 건축하며 은을 티끌 같이, 금을 거리의 진흙 같이 쌓았도다

sentences.original_text: Tyre has built herself a rampart
and heaped up silver like dust,
and fine gold like the mud of the streets.
